name: Power Panic (Rhysimus, Wassabi000, Akmonx, Albond)
description:
For HackTheMidlands Jam 2020 - Theme: Unlimited Power Click "contain the power" to play!Story

The time is sometime in the future where the human race uses alien technology for an infinite fuel source. But of course in any alien film, that technology goes against them. Unfortunately this infinite fuel source is too good, and without using up the energy or maintaining storage, it'll blow up...

Team

Rhysimus: Programmer

Albond: Programmer

Wassabi: Programmer/Art

Akmon: Art/Modelling/SFX

This is our first time together doing this, and HTM was certainly an excellent way to bring us together. We hope you enjoy!

External credits:

Porglezomp: Pyroclastics

Patrick De Artega: Songs

Google: To find sanity
